app_name: Groups Treatment Groups Apple Translate Easy Translator
app_description: Hey are you looking for the best translation app for you Easy Translator is a very easy to use and feature rich translation app that can help you just right when you need it. Advantages of Easy Translator Easy to use one click translation Text Speech OCR Translation A variety of ways to output more suitable for your usage scenarios Supports more than 80 languages 1. With multiple translation modes you can get timely feedback whether you are entering text or voice. 2. Apple speech recognition support significantly improve the recognition and translation speed. 3. The OCR mode allows you to get the information in the picture faster just take a picture of the text that needs to be translated. 4. You can save all translated texts and share them with your family and friends. Supported languages : Afrikaans Albanian Arabic Armenian Azerbaijani Basque Belarusian Bengali Bosnian Bulgarian Catalan Cebuano Chichewa Chinese Croatian Czech Danish Dutch English Esperanto Estonian Filipino Finnish French Galician Georgian German Greek Gujarati Haitian Creole Hausa Hebrew Hindi Hmong Hungarian Icelandic Igbo Indonesian Irish Italian Japanese Javanese Kannada Kazakh Khmer Korean Lao Latin Latvian Lithuanian Macedonian Malagasy Malay Malayalam Maltese Maori Marathi Mongolian Myanmar Burmese Nepali Norwegian Persian Polish Portuguese Punjabi Romanian Russian Serbian Sesotho Sinhala Slovak Slovenian Somali Spanish Sundanese Swahili Swedish Tajik Tamil Telugu Thai Turkish Ukrainian Urdu Uzbek Vietnamese Welsh Yiddish Yoruba Zulu... We sincerely hope you like Easy Translator . It is definitely an effective tool for you to communicate or seek knowledge.
